mapper.insert: insert into schedule_u (scheduleId, userId, scheduleDes, hours) values (#{scheduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scheduleDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hours,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE scheduleDes = VALUES(scheduleDes), hours = VALUES(hours)

insert into schedule_u
scheduleId,
userId,
scheduleDes,
hours,
